title: Pac-12 & Big 12 Merger?
description:
Jason Fitz, Greg McElroy, and Harry Lyles Jr. react to the recent news that Big 12 Commissioner Bob Bowlsby is meeting with the Pac-12. The crew also break down LSU's potential struggles this upcoming season in the wake of quarterback Myles Brennan's injury and take a look at some big opening week games.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The CFB Live crew break down the news of the Big 12 meeting with the Pac-12 today and potential struggles this season for LSU.
